title: Come Away to Paradise
description: What do a wayward teenage temptress, wacky Hollywood hoopla, and a weird RoboCar have in common? For stunningly attractive Allison Webster, struggling to make a name as Memphis advertising executive, they are among the Tinseltown surprises she encounters when her King of Rock ‘n’ Roll invites her to come away to paradise in Hollywood. Movie spotlights beam on love making, heart breaking, and a handsome film sensation Allison becomes smitten with while the world falls head-over-heels for her singing star. When his unforgettable Song of the Year exposes the most unsettling secret of the season, she must say yes to one and let the other one ride. In a thrilling continuation of the romantic hit Can’t Help Falling in Love, celebrated actor, singer, songwriter, and author Carol Dunitz and Pulitzer-nominee David W. Menefee step onto the red carpet with an enchanting love story that is setting box office records everywhere.
author: Carol Dunitz
